LanguageData.RAB.BasicBridge: Must be placed on shallow water or marsh
LanguageData.RAB.DeepWaterBridge: Must be placed on deep water
LanguageData.RAB.Boardwalk: Must be placed on a tile adjacent to water
LanguageData.RAB.NoFloorOnBridge: Cannot lay flooring on top of a bridge
LanguageData.RAB.NotOnFS: Cannot be placed over a fishing spot
LanguageData.RAB.FishingSpot1: Must be placed with the gazing spot over water or marsh
LanguageData.RAB.FishingSpot2: Must be placed with the gazing spot (mouse cursor) over water and the interaction spot (white circle) on land or a bridge
